name: Extreme Flexibility
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Advanced Class Guide © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: You gain a +1 dodge bonus to AC, a +4 circumstance bonus on Escape Artist checks and combat maneuver checks to escape a grapple, and +4 circumstance bonus to your CMD against grapple attempts.
text_zh: 你的AC获得+1闪避加值，逃脱检定以及挣脱擒抱的擒抱战技检定获得+4环境加值，而且你的CMD在对抗擒抱尝试时获得+4环境加值。
